headline: Dollar Tree (DLTR): Reassessing Valuation After Strategic Shift, Family Dollar Sale and New Buyback Program
summary: Dollar Tree (DLTR) just wrapped a transformative year, with its move to a multi price strategy, the sale of Family Dollar, and a fresh multi billion dollar buyback all reshaping the investment story. See our latest analysis for Dollar Tree. That pivot is already showing up in the tape, with a 90 day share price return of 45.6% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 74.1%, suggesting momentum is building behind the turnaround story at a latest share price of $127.7. If Dollar Tree's reset...
